content: you can access the free version and the paid version of this pattern by clicking the link above the free version available on my website only includes the instructions for the adult size made using the super bulky yarn the paid version includes instructions to make 4 sizes baby child teen and adult using two yarn weight options super bulky and worsted materials 68 yards/ 113 grams of a #6 super bulky yarn i used the malabrigo rasta in the color molino us35/19mm circular needles us17/12mm circular needles scissors tapestry needle tape measure notes pattern is written using standard us terms skill level intermediate check out this tutorial https //www yarnth3ory com/post/stitches-101-herringbone-stitch-knit to learn the basics of the herringbone knit stitch finished size 21 inch circumference x 5 75 inch width gauge 4 x 4 = 12sts x 9 row abbreviations k2tog = knit 2 together p2tog = purl 2 together tbl = through the back loop written pattern \*\*\* if you are not familiar with this stitch check out this stitches 101 tutorial https //www yarnth3ory com/post/stitches-101-herringbone-stitch-knit on the herringbone stitch before getting started\*\*\*
